hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT register.source_path as sourcePath, register.destination_path as targetPath, register.file_name as fileName, register.dest_file_name as destFileName, register.content_crc as crc, register.status as status, register.modified_by as modifiedBy, register.modified_date as modifiedDate, register.node_id as nodeId FROM sirma_file_register register where register.content_crc = :crc
UPDATE sirma_file_register SET status = :status, modified_by = :modified_by, modified_date = :modified_date WHERE content_crc = :crc

SELECT register.source_path as sourcePath, register.destination_path as targetPath, register.file_name as fileName, register.dest_file_name as destFileName, register.content_crc as crc, register.status as status, register.modified_by as modifiedBy, register.modified_date as modifiedDate, register.node_id as nodeId FROM sirma_file_register register where register.content_crc in (:crc)
UPDATE sirma_file_register SET modified_by = :modified_by, modified_date = :modified_date, destination_path = :destination_path , dest_file_name = :destFileName WHERE node_id = :old_node_id

UPDATE sirma_file_register SET modified_by = :modified_by, modified_date = :modified_date, destination_path = replace(destination_path, :old_destination_path, :destination_path) WHERE destination_path like :old_dest_path

UPDATE sirma_file_register SET status = :status, modified_by = :modified_by, modified_date = :modified_date, node_id = null, destination_path = null, dest_file_name = null WHERE node_id = :old_node_id
